channel.title: Command-line tools - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Command-line tools on Today I Learnt...

item.title: About `pngcrush`
item.description: It’s an image optimizer for PNG files. It’s available via Homebrew for MacOS and works like: $ pngcrush -ow screenshot.png where -ow means the original image file will be overwritten. I’ve integrated it into the til_screenshot.sh helper script used by this repo.
